trans-unit.source: Contains information about the content type (such as currency, date, or address) or language construct that determine how text should be spoken.
trans-unit.target: 包含內容類型 (例如貨幣、日期或地址) 或決定應如何讀出文字的語言建構的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <c>SayAs</c> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <c>SayAs</c> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The properties of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SayAs> class are used to get or set the values for the attributes of the `say-as` element in SSML markup.
trans-unit.target: 內容<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SayAs>類別可用來取得或設定之屬性的值`say-as`SSML 標記中的項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.SayAs%2A> property uses a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SayAs> instance to inform the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> how to speak the text contained in the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak%2A> property of a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.SayAs%2A>屬性使用<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SayAs>通知的執行個體<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>如何中包含文字的讀出<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak%2A>屬性<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the <c>detail</c> attribute for a <c>say-as</c> element in the SSML markup language of a prompt.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定提示的 SSML 標記語言中 <c>say-as</c> 項目之 <c>detail</c> 屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.SayAs%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property gets or sets the value for the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SayAs.Detail%2A> property in a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SayAs> instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.SayAs%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性會取得或設定值<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SayAs.Detail%2A>屬性<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SayAs>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the <c>format</c> attribute for a <c>say-as</c> element in the SSML markup language of a prompt.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定提示的 SSML 標記語言中 <c>say-as</c> 項目之 <c>format</c> 屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.SayAs%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property gets or sets the value for the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SayAs.Format%2A> property in a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SayAs> instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.SayAs%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性會取得或設定值<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SayAs.Format%2A>屬性<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SayAs>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: For example, a prompt may contain the phrase "The time is `<say-as interpret-as="time"> 05:00 </say-as>`".
trans-unit.target: 例如，在提示字元可能包含片語"的時間是`<say-as interpret-as="time"> 05:00 </say-as>`"。

trans-unit.source: In this example, `05:00` could be spoken as "five o’clock" or "five AM" or "oh five hundred".
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，`05:00`無法，可唸做"點鐘五 」 或 「 五個上午 」 或 「 喔五百"。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SayAs.Format%2A> property allows the value of the `interpret-as` attribute to be extended to specify which time format to speak.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SayAs.Format%2A>屬性所允許的值`interpret-as`延伸到指定要讀出的時間格式的屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the value for the `interpret-as` attribute is "time:24hour", the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> speaks "oh five hundred".
trans-unit.target: 如果值`interpret-as`屬性是 「 時間： 24 小時 」<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>說出 「 喔五百"。

trans-unit.source: If the value for the `interpret-as` attribute is "time:12hour", the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> speaks "five A M".
trans-unit.target: 如果值`interpret-as`屬性是 「 時間： 12 小時 」<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>說出 「 M 的五 」。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the <c>interpret-as</c> attribute for a <c>say-as</c> element in the SSML markup language of a prompt.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定提示的 SSML 標記語言中 <c>say-as</c> 項目之 <c>interpret-as</c> 屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.SayAs%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property gets or sets the value for the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SayAs.InterpretAs%2A> property in a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SayAs> instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.SayAs%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性會取得或設定值<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SayAs.InterpretAs%2A>屬性<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SayAs>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> uses the content type indicated by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SayAs.InterpretAs%2A> property to determine how to render specified text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>會使用所指定的內容類型<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SayAs.InterpretAs%2A>屬性來決定如何呈現指定的文字。

trans-unit.source: For example, the name Edgar could be spoken as a name: "My name is Edgar".
trans-unit.target: 例如，Edgar 無法播放做為名稱的名稱: 「 我的名稱是 Edgar 」。

trans-unit.source: Or it could be spelled out with letters, as specified with the `interpret-as` attribute in this sentence: "My name is `<say-as interpret-as="spell-out"> Edgar </say-as>`."
trans-unit.target: 找中拼字以字母，做為與指定或`interpret-as`這一句中的屬性:"我的名稱是`<say-as interpret-as="spell-out"> Edgar </say-as>`。 」

trans-unit.source: In this case, the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> speaks Edgar as "E D G A R".
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>來說 Edgar 為"E D G R"。
